content: ute `Riverx_FlightLegForPaxSchedule_Query` query * Call `CustomerManifest` service using the fields coming from `Riverx_FlightLegForPaxSchedule_Query` query result * Call `FlightManifest` service using the fields coming from `Riverx_FlightLegForPaxSchedule_Query` query result * Checked in passengers for offline stations; * Call `microsoftonline` service * Call `microsoft_messages` service using access_token coming from microsoftonline service * When `hasAttachments` field coming from `microsoftonline` service is true then call `microsoft_messages_attachments` service using `mail_id` coming from `microsoftonline` service #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: `flightLegId` * When a row is updated via LDM Parser, then no update operation will be performed for that row. * When `passengerReferenceId` is null then it is ignored. * Delete operation can not be performed because of the lack of status in the source system data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Service|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | | |arrivalAirport|`schedops.LEG`| |`ARR_AP_ACTUAL`| | |arrivalTime|`schedops.LEG`| |`ARR_SCHED_DT, ARR_DT`|when `schedops.LEG.ARR_DT` is not null then `schedops.LEG.ARR_DT` else `schedops.LEG.ARR_SCHED_DT`| |bookedPax| |`CustomerManifest`|`<TotalManifestedCount>`| | |carrier|`schedops.LEG`| |`FN_CARRIER`| | |checkedPax| |`CustomerManifest`|`<TotalCheckedinCount>`|For offline stations: LDM Parser| |departureAirport|`schedops.LEG`| |`DEP_AP_ACTUAL`| | |departureTime||`CustomerManifest`|`<ETD>`| | |flightNumber|`schedops.LEG`| |`FN_NUMBER`| | |inboundTransfers| |`FlightManifest`|`<Inbound>`|Count `<Inbound>` field for the flight| |outboundTransfers| |`FlightManifest`|`<OutBoundDetails>`|Count `<OutBoundDetails>` field for the flight| |predictedPax| | | |N/A in the source system.| |suffix| | | |The field is set to `*` in the flow.| |udor| |`FlightManifest`|`<DepartureDate>`|Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD| |flightLegId|`sched
